wybug_detail:

http://app.ent.ifeng.com/star/movie.php?id=2185'

SQL:SELECT r.to_id,b.name,av.url FROM star_relation r LEFT JOIN star_base b ON r.to_id=b.id LEFT JOIN star_avatar av ON r.to_id=av.id WHERE uid=2185\' AND b.online=1 LIMIT 6Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_vote WHERE id=2185\'http://app.ent.ifeng.com/star/movie.php?id=2185%201=2Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_news where nid=2185 1=2Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_news where nid=2185 1=2Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT content FROM star_intro WHERE id=2185 1=2Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT url FROM star_avatar WHERE id=2185 1=2Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT r.to_id,b.name,av.url FROM star_relation r LEFT JOIN star_base b ON r.to_id=b.id LEFT JOIN star_avatar av ON r.to_id=av.id WHERE uid=2185 1=2 AND b.online=1 LIMIT 6Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_vote WHERE id=2185 1=2
